item.title: Trilateral US-Ukraine-Russia peace talks resume in UAE after major energy attack
item.description: American, Ukrainian and Russian representatives are due to gather again in the United Arab Emirates on Wednesday for the next round of trilateral talk...

item.title: Minneapolis live updates: Homan to speak in Minneapolis on Wednesday
item.description: President Donald Trump's border czar, Tom Homan, was dispatched early last week to Minnesota.

item.title: McConnell hospitalized after experiencing 'flu-like symptoms'
item.description: Sen. Mitch McConnell has been hospitalized for evaluation after experiencing flu-like symptoms, his spokesperson said.

item.title: WATCH: New video shows FBI agents raid the election office in Fulton County, Georgia
item.description: It comes as Pres. Trump doubles down on his call to nationalize elections.

item.title: WATCH: Icicles form on fountain at Disney World in Florida
item.description: It was so cold in Central Florida over the weekend that icicles formed on the fountain in front of Remyâ€™s Ratatouille Adventure at EPCOT.
